pr_title: Add tenant admin username and role to the Configurations API response

timeline.message: Add tenant admin username and role to the Configurations API response
Add tenant admin username and role to the Configurations API response
Add tenant admin username and role to the Configurations API response

timeline.author: IsuraD
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -393,6 +396,24 @@ components:
           $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthenticatorListResponse'
         cors:
           $ref: '#/components/schemas/CORSConfig'
+    RealmConfig:
+      type: object
+      properties:
+        adminUser:
+            type: string
+            description: "Username of the super admin user in the system."
+            example: "admin"
+            readOnly: true
+        adminRole:
+            type: string
+            description: "Name of the super admin role in the system."
+            example: "Internal/admin"
+            readOnly: true
+        everyoneRole:
+            type: string
+            description: "Name of the everyone role in the system."
+            example: "Internal/everyone"

replies.bodyText: Internal/everyone. This is the value returned by the osgi service.
replies.author: ayshsandu
